column2: EU AI ACT - ARTICLE 13: TRANSPARENCY AND PROVISION OF INFORMATION TO DEPLOYERS
Instructions for Use - Compliance Documentation Template

column4: Legal name of the AI system provider
Name and contact details of EU representative
Main use case and application of the AI system
Who is intended to use this system
Who the AI system is intended to be used on
Environment and context of intended use
Uses that are explicitly NOT intended
Conditions under which metrics were tested
Known factors that may impact accuracy/robustness
Known circumstances that may cause health risks
Known circumstances that may cause safety risks
Reasonably foreseeable misuse and associated risks
Technical means to explain AI outputs
Specific persons/groups the system is used on
Format and structure of AI system outputs
Guidance on proper use of AI outputs
How to override or interrupt the system
How and where logs should be stored
How long logs must be retained
